view.title: Configure external channel/integration
view.subtitle: External channel integration configured and persisted through API.

blocks.title: Owner Configure External Integration completed
blocks.message: External channel integration configured and persisted through API.

blocks.title: What user sees at a glance

resultPayload.note: External channel integration configured and persisted through API.

data.instruction: Create a published offer version with realistic duration and base price for this UC.
data.expectedResult: Offer version exists and is ready for booking order references.

data.instruction: Trigger repeated booking/hold-like attempts to validate throttling, expiry, or non-blocking demand visibility behavior.
data.expectedResult: Abusive attempts are rate-limited or isolated without blocking legitimate customer flow.

data.instruction: Create an offer representing the UC primary service; choose execution mode matching the scenario.
data.expectedResult: Offer is created in draft state with captured id.
